Reviews.Title: excellent rapid texting...
Reviews.Author: James A. Mayo
Reviews.Content: tired of complicated phones that don't perform as expected? be pleasantly surprised by this phones' simplicity & user-friendliness. I was. the rapid text entry mode is great!

Reviews.Title: very slow
Reviews.Author: Esther
Reviews.Content: phone is very slow, even slower that the 1990 mobile phones. to top it off, it freezes every so often.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Thomas Witenhafer
Reviews.Content: this phone is great for some one that wants a basic phone that comes with a camera that can get on facebook

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: love it wanted a good cheap dependable phone and it works great batt life is strong last for days better than any phone ive had expensive phones batt life are a joke good job

Reviews.Title: Volume to Low!!
Reviews.Author: sunshine lady "smiles"
Reviews.Content: Not very happy with this phone. I have to keep it on speaker phone, full volume and still have to hold it up to my ear to hear.

ProductInfo.Features:
VGA Camera with 2.4" 320x240 display
Large keypad with web browsing
Bluetooth enabled
Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 350 hours (14.5 days) of standby time
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, stylus, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Huawei Verge Prepaid Phone (MetroPCS)
